sentences.en: ‘I don’t like horror movies.’ ‘Me neither.’
sentences.cn: “我不喜欢恐怖电影。”“我也不喜欢。”

sentences.en: ‘Would you like tea or coffee?’‘Neither, thanks.’
sentences.cn: “你要喝茶还是喝咖啡？”“都不要，谢谢。”

sentences.en: Both drugs slow the progression of HIV, but neither cures the disease.
sentences.cn: 这两种药物都可以延缓艾滋病病情发展，但是都不能治愈这种疾病。

sentences.en: Britain does not agree and neither do Denmark, Portugal and Ireland.
sentences.cn: 英国不同意，丹麦、葡萄牙和爱尔兰也持反对意见。

sentences.en: He likes his tea neither too hot nor too cold.
sentences.cn: 他想要杯不凉不热的茶。

sentences.en: I have received neither an acknowledgment nor a reply.
sentences.cn: 我未收到任何复函或答复。

sentences.en: I'm sixty-two. I feel sixty-two, neither more nor less.
sentences.cn: 我现在62岁了，感觉自己也确实到这把年纪了。

sentences.en: It was a game in which neither team deserved to win.
sentences.cn: 那场比赛两个队都不该赢。

sentences.en: Neither Anna nor I are interested in high finance.
sentences.cn: 安娜和我对巨额融资都不感兴趣。

sentences.en: Neither he nor his arch-rival, Giuseppe De Rita, won.
sentences.cn: 他和他的死对头朱塞佩·德里察双双落败。

sentences.en: Neither Mr Rose nor Mr Woodhead was available for comment yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天罗斯先生和伍德黑德先生都无暇发表意见。

sentences.en: Neither of the front-runners in the presidential election is a mainstream politician.
sentences.cn: 总统选举中的两位领先者都不是主流政治家。

sentences.en: Neither of them felt like going back to sleep.
sentences.cn: 他俩都不想回去睡觉。

sentences.en: Neither of us felt like going out.
sentences.cn: 我俩都不想外出。

sentences.en: Neither Oleg’s mother nor his father spoke English.
sentences.cn: 奥列格的父母都不会说英语。

sentences.en: Notices in the waiting room requested that you neither smoke nor spit.
sentences.cn: 候车室的公告牌要求人们不要吸烟和随地吐痰。

sentences.en: She lives in retirement, neither making nor receiving visits.
sentences.cn: 她过着隐退的生活， 既不访客， 也不见客。

sentences.en: That, if you'll pardon my saying so, is neither here nor there.
sentences.cn: 恕我直言，那根本就不重要。

sentences.en: The equipment is neither accurate nor safe.
sentences.cn: 这台设备既不精确，也不安全。

sentences.en: They can neither read nor write, nor can they comprehend such concepts.
sentences.cn: 他们不会读，不会写，也理解不了这样的概念。

sentences.en: We asked both John and Jerry, but neither one could offer a satisfactory explanation.
sentences.cn: 我们询问了约翰和杰里，可他俩都没能给出令人满意的解释。

sentences.en: Whether or not he realised the fact was neither here nor there.
sentences.cn: 他是否认识到事实真相无关紧要。

phrases.tran_cn: 无关紧要的或不相干的

trans.tran_en: not one or the other of two people or things
used to show that a negative statement is also true about another person or thing
used when mentioning two things that are not true or possible

trans.tran_cn: 两者都不（的），两者中无一（的）
trans.tran_en: not one or the other of two people or things
not one or the other of two people or things
